CustomField.description: This is a Lookup Field to the Opportunity Close Date When a Shoot Date is Confirmed, Close Date updates to match Shoot Date Our Accounting is Based on the 'Matching Princiciple' which states that Revenue is Earned on the Date it's Actually Earned Thus, our Invoice Dates in Quickbooks will always be equal to the Opportunity Close Date Close Date for Productions = Initial Shoot Date Close Date for Post Productions = Date of Initial Opportunity Lead
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a Lookup Field to the Opportunity Close Date When a Shoot Date is Confirmed, Close Date updates to match Shoot Date Our Accounting is Based on the 'Matching Princiciple' which states that Revenue is Earned on the Date it's Actually Earned Thus, our Invoice Dates in Quickbooks will always be equal to the Opportunity Close Date Close Date for Productions = Initial Shoot Date Close Date for Post Productions = Date of Initial Opportunity Lead
CustomField.label: Close Date
